ygData.subject: Re: OOPS  Accidental Kill Steal.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm..well it doesn t appear I m the only one having problems reading it.  What program do you use to view email?  And I wonder what program Bob uses as well.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm..well it doesn't appear I'm the only one having problems reading
it. What program do you use to view email? And I wonder what program Bob
uses as well. His is the only email that does that. The two others he
sent in looked the same. I use Eudora pro so its not som funky off the
wall program that doesn't ready anything but normal text. Has html
capacity and the whole nine yards.



At 03:55 PM 6/27/99 +0200, you wrote:
